pros: Pay is good, work is easy. Not overloaded throughout day
cons: Equipment needs updated. Local mgt doesn't follow state regulations.

review_title: Low pay and little direction from leadership
pros:
You will gain lots of experience.
Benefits are better for similar positions but fall behind other public safety organizations.
cons:
You will be seen as disposable.
Underpaid and overworked should be the cornerstone of this organization.
Director admitted to not having a mission statement. There is no long-term plan for the direction of this organization.

job_title: Emergency Medical Technician in Little Rock, AR
pros: Every day is a new day. You don’t know what you’ll get once you’re on the truck. I enjoy the thrill.
cons: Long hours can lead to imbalance in the workplace and outside life. We’re short-staffed so depending on the day, you might get run ragged.
